project_description: A simple Flutter app that toggles between displaying 'Cat' with a clock icon and 'Dog' with a person icon when clicked.
architecture_overview: The project follows the Cubit pattern for state management, using a modular structure to separate concerns. The main components are organized into separate directories for screens, cubits, and models.

files.name: lib/main.dart
files.description: Entry point of the application. Sets up the Cubit and provides it to the widget tree.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Main entry point of the app.

files.name: lib/screens/home_screen.dart
files.description: Defines the HomeScreen widget, which displays the current animal and toggles it when tapped.

files.name: lib/cubits/animal_cubit.dart
files.description: Defines the AnimalCubit, which manages the state of the currently displayed animal.

methods.name: toggleAnimal
methods.description: Toggles the current animal between Cat and Dog.

files.name: lib/models/animal_model.dart
files.description: Defines the Animal model, which represents either a Cat or a Dog.

widgets.name: HomeScreen
widgets.description: Displays the current animal and toggles it when tapped.

cubits.name: AnimalCubit
cubits.description: Manages the state of the currently displayed animal.

methods.name: toggleAnimal
methods.description: Toggles the current animal between Cat and Dog.

models.name: Animal
models.description: Represents either a Cat or a Dog.

dependencies.name: flutter
dependencies.purpose: Base framework for building the app.

sequence_diagram:
@startuml
actor User
participant HomeScreen
participant AnimalCubit
User -> HomeScreen : taps 'Cat'
HomeScreen -> AnimalCubit : toggleAnimal()
AnimalCubit -> HomeScreen : Dog
HomeScreen -> User : displays 'Dog'
@enduml
state_management_flow: The state is managed using AnimalCubit. The HomeScreen listens to state changes in AnimalCubit and updates the UI accordingly. When the user taps the displayed animal, the toggleAnimal method of AnimalCubit is called to toggle the state between Cat and Dog.
navigation_flow: As a single-screen application, there is no complex navigation. The main.dart file sets up the HomeScreen, which is the only screen displayed.
